title: Made the leap to Amazon Web Services!
body:
It's time for a change. I'm leaving Boeing Defense (nee Liquid Robotics), with many fond memories. Today I start a new Adventure at Amazon Web Services. I've been getting a lot of questions on what I'll be working on at Amazon. Sadly, I can't say: it's Amazon's policy to be quiet. As much as secrecy can be annoying, it usually makes sense.

This blog has become almost totally stagnant. These days, I mostly use Facebook for posting.
